ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] MatchesListRegExpDecideRule behaving strange.
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Anmol, Try excluding  and don t escaping slash. Just add the following to the text box (or to the tag via text editor):

Hi Anmol,

Try excluding '"' and don't escaping slash.

Just add the following to the text box (or to the tag via text editor):

.*(chesapeakeimaging.com/)+.*(ShoppingCart\.tpl)+.*

Let us know if this worked.

Take care,
i.

P.S.  I recommend that you anchor regular expressions. It can help with 
avoiding some backtracking.

Maybe even something like:
^(?i)https?://(?:www\.)?chesapeakeimaging\.com/.*ShoppingCart\.tpl.*$

> Hi,
> 
> I have set up Crawl Scope with a Deciding Scope and the final Decide 
> Rule I have applied is
> 
> /org.archive.crawler.deciderules.MatchesListRegExpDecideRule
> 
> / The List URL I have added is
> 
> ".*(chesapeakeimaging.com/)+.*(ShoppingCart\\.tpl)+.* 
> <http://chesapeakeimaging.com/)+.*(ShoppingCart\\.tpl)+.*>"
> and it keeps passing the URL
> http://www.chesapeakeimaging.com/ShoppingCart.tpl?rnd=8145&command=showcart&db=db/products.db&cart=641E32DF-365F-462D-B769-B9F13A267A20&hide_cat=t 
> <http://www.chesapeakeimaging.com/ShoppingCart.tpl?rnd=8145&command=showcart&db=db/products.db&cart=641E32DF-365F-462D-B769-B9F13A267A20&hide_cat=t>
> 
> However if I Test
> 
> TextUtils.matches(".*( chesapeakeimaging.com/)+.*(ShoppingCart\\.tpl)+.* 
> <http://chesapeakeimaging.com/)+.*(ShoppingCart\\.tpl)+.*>", " 
> http://www.chesapeakeimaging.com/ShoppingCart.tpl?rnd=8145&command=showcart&db=db/products.db&cart=641E32DF-365F-462D-B769-B9F13A267A20&hide_cat=t 
> <http://www.chesapeakeimaging.com/ShoppingCart.tpl?rnd=8145&command=showcart&db=db/products.db&cart=641E32DF-365F-462D-B769-B9F13A267A20&hide_cat=t>"))
> 
> it returns true. Any ideas what could be wrong? Guidance appreciated.
> 
> Anmol
> 
> 
>
